form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: APPLICATION FOR ALIEN EMPLOYMENT CERTIFICATION, Form No. 575A

full_text: Screened by NARA, 09/21/2023 FORM ESr 575 APPLICATION FOR ALIEN EMPLOYMENT CERTI ATION Budget Bureau No. 44-R1301 Expiration Date: 8/31/66 PART A - STATEMENT OF QUALIFICATIONS OF ALIEN (ES-575A) 2870 IDENTIFYING AND PERSONAL DATA 1. (Family name in capital letters) (First name) (Middle name) (Maiden name, if alien is a married woman) NAME OF ALIEN Ramon Wong Fong Song 2. ALIEN'S BIRTHDATE 3. BIRTHPLACE (City or town) (State or Province) (Country) 4. PRESENT NATIONALITY OR CITI- 3-3-12 ZENSHIP Hoy San Canton China Mexico 5. PRESENT ADDRESS (Number and Street) (City or town) (State or Province) (Country) Morelos 251 Mexicali Baja California Mexico 6. ADDRESS IN UNITED STATES WHERE ALIEN WILL RESIDE P. O. Box 1108, EL Centro, California 7. KIND OF WORK ALIEN IS SEEKING 8. IF ALIEN IS SEEKING CHANGE OF CLASSIFICATION GIVE TYPE OF VISA NOW HELD Chinese Food Cook none 9. EDUCATION AND TRAINING DEGREES OR NAMES AND ADDRESSES OF SCHOOLS, FIELD OF STUDY FROM TO CERTIFICATES COLLEGES OR UNIVERSITIES RECEIVED Canton Elementary general studies - - - Mexicali, Mexico Escuela Chuahutemoc spanish 1926 1928 - Private English Teacher english off and on -- SPECIAL QUALIFICATIONS AND SKILLS 10. DESCRIBE SPECIAL QUALIFICATIONS POSSESSED (List any certificates or licenses that give evidence of alien's abilities. For example, as re- quired for employment in occupations such as architect, engineer, lawyer, physician, surgeon, teacher). chinese foods cook and spanish foods 11. DESCRIBE ANY SPECIAL SKILLS ALIEN POSSESSES AND PROFICIENCY IN THE USE OF TOOLS, MACHINES OR EQUIPMENT. Stove heat grdduation and meat saw, meat cutting 12. GIVE ANY ADDITIONAL INFORMATION CONCERNING ALIEN NOT GIVEN ELSEWHERE WHICH WOULD HELP ESTABLISH ALIEN'S QUALIFI- CATIONS. Have constantly working and operating chinese restaurant 13. LIST DOCUMENTS ATTACHED WHICH ARE SUBMITTED AS EVIDENCE THAT ALIEN POSSESSES THE EDUCATION, TRAINING, EXPERIENCE AND ABILITIES REPRESENTED. Letter from Restaurant La Gran Muralla CONSULATE GENERAL OF THE UNITED STATES OF AMERICA (MAKE NO ENTRY IN THIS SECTION - FOR DEPARTMENT USE-UNANA, MEXICO MAR 22 1966 (SEE OVER)
